snippet: The more interesting political divide may be between President Obama and the growing ranks of Republican governors who will help decide the fate of many of his policies.
abstract: News analysis; more interesting political divide than just Democratic president battling with Republican house may be between Pres Obama and growing ranks of Republican governors who will help decide fate of many of his policies; several make clear at Republican Governors Association meeting in Las Vegas that they will sometimes try to check Obama's powers.
lead_paragraph: The more interesting political divide may be between President Obama and the growing ranks of Republican governors who will help decide the fate of many of his policies.

headline.seo: G.O.P. Governors Ready to the Hold Line On Obama Policies
